## 1.1.0 [16th November 2022]

### Added

- Amaze widget added
- Dream widget added
- Evolve widget added
- Flash widget added
- Floral widget added
- Maven widget added
- Pastel widget added
- Menuz widget added
- Tread widget added
- Xero widget added
- Fixer widget added
- Heron widget added
- Humble widget added
- Insta widget added
- Loop widget added
- Trance widget added
- Masonry feature added
- Items Align option added

## 1.0.1 [13th August 2022]

### Added

- Column auto fill option added

### Fixed

- Some minor issue fixed
- Row issue fixed in Fabric widget

## 1.0.0
- Initial Release
